channel.title: Pip on Michael Brunger
channel.description: Recent content in Pip on Michael Brunger

item.title: Part 6: Virtual Environments & Packaging in Python
item.description: Discover how to create and manage virtual environments, install packages with pip, structure your own Python projects, and publish packages to PyPI with best practices.

item.title: Part 10: The Python Ecosystem & Interactive Data Workflows
item.description: Compare package managers (pip vs. conda), explore Anaconda Navigator, and learn to use Jupyter Notebooks for interactive data analysis and visualization.
